meanings.definition: Moses: a Hebrew prophet and lawgiver
meanings.sent1: In the Bible, Moses led the Israelites out of Egypt.
meanings.sent2: People believe that Moses received the Ten Commandments from God.
meanings.sent3: When Moses saw the burning bush, he was surprised.
meanings.sent4: The story of Moses parting the Red Sea is well-known.
meanings.sent5: Children often learn about Moses in Sunday school.

meanings.definition: Moses: to lead or guide someone or something to a destination
meanings.sent1: The tour guide expertly moses the group through the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: She moses her friends to the best ice cream shop in town.
meanings.sent3: The GPS device moses the driver to the nearest gas station.
meanings.sent4: The teacher moses the students through the difficult math problem.
meanings.sent5: The shepherd moses the sheep to the green pasture.

meanings.definition: Moses: a male given name of Hebrew origin
meanings.sent1: Moses is a common name among Jewish families.
meanings.sent3: Moses and his brother Aaron were both important figures in the Bible.
meanings.sent4: I have a friend named Moses who is very kind.
